refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A C gateway function which specifies which variables created inside the C interface will be returned as an output argumen into Scilab.
WARNING: This API is deprecated from Scilab 5.2.0 and is going to be removed with Scilab 6.0. Please use API Scilab (the new Scilab API).

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: This example takes a matrix of doubles as input and returns:

listitem.para: the number of lines (first output argument)
the number of rows (second output argument)

refsection.para: We create an intermediate Scilab parameter which will handle an integer but will neither be used nor returned as an output argument.
